18#include "Point.h"
19#include "ZXContainerAlgorithms.h"
20
21#include <array>
22
23namespace ZXing {
24
25template <typename T>
26class Quadrilateral : public std::array<T, 4>
27{
28 using Base = std::array<T, 4>;
29 using Base::at;
30public:
31 using Point = T;
32
33 Quadrilateral() = default;
34 Quadrilateral(T tl, T tr, T br, T bl) : Base{tl, tr, br, bl} {}
35 template <typename U>
36 Quadrilateral(PointT<U> tl, PointT<U> tr, PointT<U> br, PointT<U> bl)
37 : Quadrilateral(Point(tl), Point(tr), Point(br), Point(bl))
38 {}
39
40 inline constexpr Point topLeft() const noexcept { return at(0); }
41 inline constexpr Point topRight() const noexcept { return at(1); }
42 inline constexpr Point bottomRight() const noexcept { return at(2); }
43 inline constexpr Point bottomLeft() const noexcept { return at(3); }
44
45 inline double rotation() const
46 {
47 auto centerLine = (topRight() + bottomRight()) - (topLeft() + bottomLeft());
48 if (centerLine == Point{})
49 return 0.;
50 auto centerLineF = normalized(centerLine);
51 return std::atan2(centerLineF.y, centerLineF.x);
52 }
53};
54
55using QuadrilateralF = Quadrilateral<PointF>;
56using QuadrilateralI = Quadrilateral<PointI>;
57
58template <typename PointT = PointF>
59Quadrilateral<PointT> Rectangle(int width, int height, typename PointT::value_t margin = 0)
60{
61 return {
62 PointT{margin, margin}, {width - margin, margin}, {width - margin, height - margin}, {margin, height - margin}};
63}
64
65template <typename PointT = PointI>
66Quadrilateral<PointT> Line(int y, int xStart, int xStop)
67{
68 return {PointT{xStart, y}, {xStop, y}, {xStop, y}, {xStart, y}};
69}
70
71template <typename PointT>
72bool IsConvex(const Quadrilateral<PointT>& poly)
73{
74 const int N = Size(poly);
75 bool sign = false;
76
77 for(int i = 0; i < N; i++)
78 {
79 auto d1 = poly[(i + 2) % N] - poly[(i + 1) % N];
80 auto d2 = poly[i] - poly[(i + 1) % N];
81 auto cp = crossProduct(d1, d2);
82
83 if (i == 0)
84 sign = cp > 0;
85 else if (sign != (cp > 0))
86 return false;
87 }
88
89 return true;
90}
91
92
93} // ZXing
